title: Assouad type dimensions of homogeneous Moran sets and Cantor-like sets
authors: Yanzhe Li, Jun Li, Shuang Liang, Manli Lou
abstract:
In this paper, we give the Assouad dimension formula and the upper bound of
the lower dimension for homogeneous Moran sets under the condition $\sup_{k\ge
1}\{n_{k}\}<+\infty$. We also give the Assouad spectrum and the lower spectrum
formulas for Cantor-like sets.
